titleStmt.title: Sixe sermons preached by Maister Henry Smith at Clement Danes Church without Temple barre. VVith tvvo prayers of the same author hereunto annexed.
titleStmt.author: Smith, Henry, 1550?-1591.
W. S.

publicationStmt.publisher: by R[ichard]. F[ield]. for Robert Dexter, dwelling at the Brasen serpent in Paules Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Includes: "The first [-second] sermon of the Song of Simeon", "The calling of Ionah", "The first [-second] sermon of the rebellion of Ionah" and "The punishment of Ionah".
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: the Brasen serpent in Paules Church-yard
